caption: Table 1: Overcooked Results
description: This table presents the results of experiments conducted in the Overcooked environment.  It compares the performance of the proposed Empowerment via Successor Representations (ESR) method against three baselines: Reward Inference, AvE (Assistance via Empowerment), and a random agent. The comparison is done across three different layouts of the Overcooked environment: Asymmetric Advantages, Coordination Ring, and Cramped Room.  The numbers represent the average reward achieved (± standard error) by each method in each layout, illustrating the effectiveness of ESR, particularly in more complex scenarios.
